verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יְדוּת֗וּן <S%H3038><s%> to Jeduthun מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> only אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> upon God דּֽוּמִיָּ֣ה <S%H1747><s%> waiteth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> Truly my soul מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> from him [cometh] my salvation

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he צ֭וּרִי <S%H6697><s%> He only [is] my rock וִֽישׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> and my salvation מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <S%H4869><s%> [he is] my defence לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶמּ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> moved רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> I shall not be greatly

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֤נָה ׀ <S%H575><s%> How תְּהֽוֹתְת֣וּ <S%H2050><s%> How long will ye imagine mischief עַל <S%H5921><s%> and אִישׁ֮ <S%H376><s%> A man תְּרָצְּח֪וּ <S%H7523><s%> you may murder כֻ֫לְּכֶ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> all כְּקִ֥יר <S%H7023><s%> wall נָט֑וּי <S%H5186><s%> all of you as a bowing גָּ֝דֵ֗ר <S%H1447><s%> fence הַדְּחוּיָֽה׃ <S%H1760><s%> [shall ye be and as] a tottering

אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> only מִשְּׂאֵת֨וֹ ׀ <S%H7613><s%> from his excellency יָעֲצ֣וּ <S%H3289><s%> They only consult לְהַדִּיחַ֮ <S%H5080><s%> to cast [him] down יִרְצ֪וּ <S%H7521><s%> they delight כָ֫זָ֥ב <S%H3577><s%> in lies בְּפִ֥יו <S%H6310><s%> with their mouth יְבָרֵ֑כוּ <S%H1288><s%> they bless וּ֝בְקִרְבָּ֗ם <S%H7130><s%> inwardly יְקַלְלוּ־ <S%H7043><s%> but they curse סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> only לֵ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> thou only upon God דּ֣וֹמִּי <S%H1826><s%> wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> My soul כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> For תִּקְוָתִֽי׃ <S%H8615><s%> for my expectation

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he צ֭וּרִי <S%H6697><s%> He only [is] my rock וִֽישׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> and my salvation מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <S%H4869><s%> [he is] my defence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> I shall not be moved

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> In God יִשְׁעִ֣י <S%H3468><s%> [is] my salvation וּכְבוֹדִ֑י <S%H3519><s%> and my glory צוּר־ <S%H6697><s%> the rock עֻזִּ֥י <S%H5797><s%> of my strength מַ֝חְסִ֗י <S%H4268><s%> [and] my refuge בֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> [is] in God

בִּטְח֘וּ <S%H982><s%> Trust ב֤וֹ בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֨ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> in him at all times עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> [ye] people שִׁפְכֽוּ־ <S%H8210><s%> pour out לְפָנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> before לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> your heart אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> him God מַחֲסֶה־ <S%H4268><s%> [is] a refuge לָּ֣נוּ סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> for us Selah

אַ֤ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> are only הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> of low degree [are] vanity בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אָדָם֮ <S%H120><s%> man כָּזָ֪ב <S%H3577><s%> of high degree [are] a lie בְּנֵ֫י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [and] men בְּמֹאזְנַ֥יִם <S%H3976><s%> in the balance לַעֲל֑וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to be laid הֵ֝֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like מֵהֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [lighter] than vanity יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> they [are] altogether

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> Trust בְעֹשֶׁק֮ <S%H6233><s%> not in oppression וּבְגָזֵ֪ל <S%H1498><s%> in robbery אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּ֫הְבָּ֥לוּ <S%H1891><s%> and become not vain חַ֤יִל ׀ <S%H2428><s%> if riches כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָנ֑וּב <S%H5107><s%> increase אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּשִׁ֥יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> set לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> not your heart

אַחַ֤ת ׀ <S%H259><s%> once דִּבֶּ֬ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God שְׁתַּֽיִם־ <S%H8147><s%> twice ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> this שָׁמָ֑עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> have I heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> That עֹ֝֗ז <S%H5797><s%> that power לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> [belongeth] unto God

וּלְךָֽ־ אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> Also unto thee O Lord חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [belongeth] mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> You תְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> for thou renderest לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to every man כְּֽמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> according to his work
